name: Triangle Evolution Simulator
description:
Triangles want nothing more than to eat green circles and reproduce

Acting like a simple organism, triangles reproduce by cloning themselves, and require a small amount of nourishment from green circles each second

Each triangle has a unique gene, that you can even create, that dictates is speed, rotate speed, sight, and size. Each characteristic of the gene has an effect on the triangle’s nourishment needs.

Can you evolve the apex triangle?

Assets Used
  • Casual Game BGM #5 by B.G.M
